title: OS Image Template
description: Defines the layout for a raw or VHD/X image

filename.description: Name of the output disk image file, e.g. "disk.raw"

size.description: Size of the disk image, e.g. "4GiB"

name.description: Identifier for this partition, e.g. "EFI" or "Root"

type.description: "efi" for the EFI System Partition, "primary" for other partitions

size.description: Size of this partition, e.g. "512MiB" or "rest"

fsType.description: Filesystem type to format this partition with

mountPoint.description: Mount point inside the chroot, e.g. "/boot/efi" or "/"
